sentences.en: Blue chips generally pay dividends and are favorably regarded by investors.
sentences.cn: 绩优股一般来说会分股利,受到投资者的欢迎.

sentences.en: But, Mr Smith, our price itself shows very favorably already.
sentences.cn: 史密斯先生, 我们的报价已经是很优惠的了.

sentences.en: I think they want kids to be favorably disposed to this company and see them in a more positive light.
sentences.cn: 我觉得他们是想让孩子们认可这种陪伴，并且对他们能够正眼相看。

sentences.en: In fact, our end - users are favorably impressed with your exhibits.
sentences.cn: 事实上, 我们的用户已对贵方展品产生良好的印象.

sentences.en: It has been received favorably in many markets abroad.
sentences.cn: 海外市场很欢迎这个产品.

sentences.en: Meanwhile, their male colleagues are much more favorably treated in similar situations.
sentences.cn: 而雷同形势下, 男同事得到的看待显然要亲热得多.

sentences.en: Only a few years ago, rural - urban migration was viewed favorably in the economic development literature.
sentences.cn: 几年前, 人口从农村向城市的迁移在发展经济学文献中被认为是令人振奋的现象.

sentences.en: Our great motherland is favorably endowed climately.
sentences.cn: 我们祖国的气候(真是)得天独厚.

sentences.en: Should you think favorably application, I would like to have an interview.
sentences.cn: 如本人应征优先考虑,恳惠予面试机.

sentences.en: Should you think favorably application, kindly grant me an interview.
sentences.cn: 如本人应征优先考虑,恳准予面试.

sentences.en: Should you think favorably of my application , kindly grant me an interview.
sentences.cn: 如贵公司有意面试,本人一定遵照所指定的时日、前往拜访.

sentences.en: The high efficiency reflected favorably on your ability as a leader.
sentences.cn: 高效率有利地反映了你作为领导的才能.

sentences.en: The queens in history compare favorably with the kings ( Elizabeth Cady Stanton )
sentences.cn: 历史上的皇后同国王比起来更讨人喜欢 ( 伊丽莎白卡迪斯坦顿 )

sentences.en: The situation contrasted favorably to that of a year earlier.
sentences.cn: 状况确比一年以前有利了.

sentences.en: We're favorably impressed by your proposal a sole distributor.
sentences.cn: 对贵方提议由我方担任独家经销商一事,咱们颇感兴趣.

words.tran_cn: 有利的；良好的；赞成的，赞许的；讨人喜欢的
有利的；受到优待的；受到喜爱的
顺利地；有利地；好意地（等于favorably）
赞成；宠爱；帮助（favor的过去分词）；给…以恩惠
